name: MMMONSTER sKILL
description: Check out this 2D platformer created in the style of retro games. One of the three main characters of your choosing is ready to challenge the enemy. The game takes place on the open spaces of the plant, which is ruled by an evil television company Shansung. Your goal is to go through all the rooms and destroy hostile television. The game supports three types of controllers: keyboard, usb gamepad, and xbox360 gamepad.
